Text: speed4speed is it an .iso file or .000, my xbox 360 wont play the other DNL release wich is a .000 file, thanks for the game btw.
if it's a .000 file you just edit the .dvd file in Notepad and change the .iso part to .000 then your burning app will apply the layerbreak correctly

Just some info; this version alone fails the Xbox Backup Creator Stealth Check, but the patches for the game can be find at: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3723677/Crackdown.Stealth.Files.For.RANT.Release.iXTREME12.XBOX360-WORKi
